name: Jack B.
quote: It is impossible to travel faster than the speed of light, and certainly not desirable, as one's hat keeps blowing off.

name: Taylor B.
quote: I hear, I know. I see, I remember. I do, I understand.

name: Jack B.
quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.

name: Taylor B.
quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.

name: Jack B.
quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
